letters

Class Letter<C extends Content>

  • java.lang.Object
    • letters.Letter<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Content's type of the letter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecoratingLetter, PromissaryNote, ReceiptAcknowledgmentLetter, SimpleLetter, ThanksLetter

    public abstract class Letter<C extends Content>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class which defines an unspecific letter
    Author:
    Thomas OSTROWSKI
